languages.text: "Все очевидно. Если сейчас отказаться от знаний Амарната, все жертвы будут напрасными".
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
languages.original_text: "Все очевидно. Если сейчас отказаться от знаний Амарната, все жертвы будут напрасными".

traits.locale_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."
"It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

languages.text: 「自明のことだ。今、{mf|俺|私}たちがアマルナトの知識を拒めば、すべての犠牲が無駄になる」
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「自明のことだ。今、{mf|俺|私}たちがアマルナトの知識を拒めば、すべての犠牲が無駄になる」

languages.text: “他的意思显而易见。如果我们现在拒绝阿玛纳特的知识，那所有牺牲都会白费。”
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: “他的意思显而易见。如果我们现在拒绝阿玛纳特的知识，那所有牺牲都会白费。”

languages.text: « C'est pourtant évident. Il veut dire que si nous rejetons les connaissances d'Amarnat maintenant, tous ces sacrifices auront été vains. »
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: « C'est pourtant évident. Il veut dire que si nous rejetons les connaissances d'Amarnat maintenant, tous ces sacrifices auront été vains. »

languages.text: «Es obvio. Si rechazamos el conocimiento de Amarnat ahora, todos los sacrificios habrán sido en vano».
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: «Es obvio. Si rechazamos el conocimiento de Amarnat ahora, todos los sacrificios habrán sido en vano».

languages.text: "Es ist offensichtlich. Wenn wir Amarnats Wissen jetzt ablehnen, dann waren alle Opfer umsonst."
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist offensichtlich. Wenn wir Amarnats Wissen jetzt ablehnen, dann waren alle Opfer umsonst."

languages.text: "Açık. Şu an Amarnat'ın irfanını reddedersek onca fedakârlıklar boşa yapılmış olacak."
languages.original_text: "It is obvious. If we reject Amarnat's knowledge now, all the sacrifice will have been in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Açık. Şu an Amarnat'ın irfanını reddedersek, tüm fedakârlıklar boşa gitmiş olacak."
